name: Save The Rum
description:
Save The Rum is an endless runner where you have to protect your rum from ravaging pirates. You'll be throwing barrels and stomping enemies in pursuit of the next biggest highscore and all of that in a charming hand-drawn environment.

This game is still in development, so any feedback you might have is greatly appreciated. You can follow me on twitter to receive latest updates: https://twitter.com/bytes_iron
